name: Biketris
description:
A GitHub Game Off 2018 Entry

Hybrid between a block-building puzzle and endless runner.

Controls

Use arrow keys to control and build road for the biker.

Keys Action ◄ ► Move blocks left and right ▲ Rotate blocks ▼ Drop blocks to form road

Instructions

Keep the biker riding as long as possible. You can ascend single row at any time, while there are no limit on how many rows you can drop. You are allowed to ride over single block gap, but will crash when falling into 2 or 3 block gaps.

When riding, keep eye on fuel gauge. You can pick up extra fuel by riding over green fuel cans. 

Source code

GameMaker source code available at https://github.com/vikerlane/Biketris
